channel.title: CVE Feed for The Linux Kernel Organization -- linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Linux Kernel Organization -- linux

item.title: CVE-2023-1032|2024-08-27T15:48:22.031Z -- the%20linux%20kernel%20organization -- linux
item.description: The Linux kernel io_uring IORING_OP_SOCKET operation contained a double free in function __sys_socket_file() in file net/socket.c. This issue was introduced in da214a475f8bd1d3e9e7a19ddfeb4d1617551bab and fixed in 649c15c7691e9b13cbe9bf6c65c365350e056067.
